add.title: Proof of Tuition Fee Payment
add.description: Receipt showing you have paid the tuition fee or have a scholarship.

add.title: Health Insurance
add.description: Private health insurance covering medical costs up to 40,000 EUR.

steps_flow.title: University Admission
steps_flow.description: Apply via 'Studyinfo.fi' and accept the study place.

steps_flow.title: Apply on Enter Finland
steps_flow.description: Create an account on 'Enter Finland' and submit the Residence Permit application.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a slot at VFS Global to prove your identity and give biometrics.

steps_flow.title: Wait for Decision
steps_flow.description: The Finnish Immigration Service (Migri) processes the application.

steps_flow.title: Collect Card
steps_flow.description: Collect your Residence Permit card from VFS.

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

required_exams: SAT (Accepted by some universities like Aalto)

pre_visa_steps.title: Joint Application
pre_visa_steps.description: Apply for up to 6 programs on Studyinfo.fi.

pre_visa_steps.title: Entrance Exams
pre_visa_steps.description: Take online or on-site entrance exams if required.

pre_visa_steps.title: Accept Offer
pre_visa_steps.description: Confirm your study place on Studyinfo.fi.

pre_visa_steps.title: Pay Tuition
pre_visa_steps.description: Pay the tuition fee to the university.
